name: General Dodonna
description: Before an enemy ship is dealt a faceup damage card, look at the top 4 cards of the damage deck, place 1 on top of the deck, and discard the others.

name: Garm Bel Iblis
description: At the start of the first round and the fifth round, each friendly ship may gain a number of tokens equal to its command value.

name: Mon Mothma
description: When a friendly ship resolves the <evade/> token effect, it can cancel 1 die at medium range or reroll 1 die at close range or distance 1.

name: General Rieekan
description: When a friendly ship or friendly unique squadron is destroyed, it remains in the play area and is treated as if it was not destroyed until the end of the Status Phase.

name: Admiral Ackbar
description: Before a friendly ship's Attack Step, it may choose to attack from only its left and right hull zones this round. If it does, it may add 2 red dice to its attack pool while attacking a ship.

name: Admiral Ozzel
description: When a friendly ship resolves a <maneuver/> command, it may change its speed by an additional 1

name: Admiral Motti
description:
the hull value of each friendly ship is increased according to its size class:
Small ship: 1
Medium ship: 2
Large ship: 3

name: Admiral Screed
description: Once per activation, when a friendly ship is attacking, it may spend 1 die to change a die to a face with a <critical/> icon.

name: Darth Vader
description: While a friendly ship is attacking a ship, it may spend 1 defense token to reroll any number of dice in its attack pool.

name: Grand Moff Tarkin
description: At the start of each Ship Phase, you may choose 1 command. Each friendly ship gains a command token matching that command.
